content:
Craft an item of type: stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}]
thought: To craft a stone_brick_slab I need to first craft 4 stone_bricks. Stone_bricks requires placing 4 stone in the crafting grid, therefore I will move 1 stone from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}]
thought: Since there is already 1 stone in slot 1, I will move another stone from slot 31 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}]
thought: I have moved 2 stones into the crafting grid, so now I will move another stone from slot 31 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}]
thought: I have moved 3 stones into the crafting grid, so now I will move the last stone from slot 31 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}]
thought: Now I have crafted 4 stone_bricks, so I will move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "spruce_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}]
thought: I have four stone bricks in my inventory and I want to make a stone brick slab. Therefore I will move one stone brick to slot 1, which is the top left corner of the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "spruce_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}]

thought: The recipe for stone brick slabs requires three stone bricks in a row. I have already moved one stone brick to slot 1, so I will move another stone brick to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "spruce_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}]
thought: I have already moved two stone bricks to slots 1 and 2, so I will move the last stone brick to slot 3, which is to the right of slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "spruce_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}]
thought: I have now crafted six stone brick slabs, which are in the crafting output slot (0). I will move them to an empty slot (13) in my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 6
